column4: Does anyone know where i can get ndiswrapper without using Synaptic Package Manager ? I am tethered to phone for internet and i cant download anything without using proxies first?
Does anyone know where i can get ndiswrapper without using Synaptic Package Manager ? I am tethered to phone for internet and i cant download anything without using proxies first?
Billiard i have the internet . I just cant use synaptic without a proxy because i am tethered to my phone. I can download through firefox just fine but no applications
!whois dan_
use apt-get and set http_proxy before
How do you set http_proxy ?
export http_proxy=http://your-proxy
Ok i will try that one sec.
export http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:9000 is what i tried and its still failing to fetch :
thats localhost
I am tethered SSH through my iphone
port 9000 on Socks5 though
Does any of that make sense lol ?
if your proxy listens on port 9000 it should work
That is how i have xchat and firefox setup and they both work fine :\
is that a socks-proxy?
Yea socksv5
http://linux.derkeiler.com/Mailing-Lists/Debian/2004-07/0542.html
Ok, lets give that a shot
I am assuming i have to make the .conf file ?
ifconfig, to make it permanent, use /etc/network/interfaces
read "man interfaces"
